sentences: Sofya Gulyak (born 29 December 1979) is a Russian classical pianist.
In 2006, she won first prize in the Sigismund Thalberg International Piano Competition.
In 2007, she won the William Kapell Competition and shared the Concorso F. Busoni second prize with Dinara Nadzhafova.
Gulyak was the winner of the 2008 Washington International Competition of the Friday Morning Music Club, and also won ISANGYUN Competition 2008.
In 2009, she won the 1st prize in the Leeds International Pianoforte Competition.
